message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $15000 to me, reflecting its unique features, craftsmanship, and the time invested in its creation. I believe it could be a valuable asset to you as well. To secure this opportunity, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14000. This represents a generous discount, allowing you to benefit from the product's true worth while saving $1000. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
